subject: Service options: Drive-through
body:
Service options: Drive-through
Address: 290 S Pleasant burg Dr,
Greenville, SC 29607, USA
Departments: Regions Mortgage
Hours: Open · Closes 5PM · More hours
Attention:
This is in respect of your inherited payment of US$44.000.000.000.00 Billion US Dollars, the Commercial Bank head office Authorities will deliver you a new (2024) ATM VISA CARD that will accumulate your total funds of US$44 Billion USD according to the instruction from our creditor department After the board of directors consent and approved the payment in a new ATM VISA CARD which you must use to withdraw your fund in any ATM slotting machine around the world with maximum amount of $40,000 USD in daily payment until you cash the total payment of US$44 Billion USD credited in your ATM account.
You have to send the required fee of $50.00 USD Through BTC or USDT or USDC or ETH WALLET ADDRESS or Itune card or steam wallet card request to obtain Affidavit of claim Ownership with government of your fund origin
 been Federal Justice Greenville SC USA ,the US Monetary Fund Investigation Union head office in Greenville will declare your payment free from any money laundry and terrorism drug money sponsor activities to enable our service have the authority of release the payment to you and register it with US IMPEX COURIER SERVICE for overnight delivery to your address without delay.
Send the payment $50.00 usd BTC or USDT or USDC or ETH WALLET ADDRESS or Steam wallet card, iTune card or American express card of $50.00 send (Pin code and picture here.
Reconfirm the following information to Receive the ATM VISA CARD.
Your Name:
Address:
Mobile phone:
Direct phone number:
Mrs Vivian Sarah Micheal
Chief Financial Officer

subject: Re: Service options: Drive-through
body:
Hello Mrs. Vivian Sarah Micheal,

Thank you for reaching out to me about this matter. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about an inherited payment of such a large amount! 

I'm curious though, how did my name come up in relation to this inheritance? And could you please explain more about the ATM VISA CARD and how it works? I've never heard of such a thing before.

Also, could you provide more details on the Affidavit of claim Ownership? What exactly does it entail and why is there a fee associated with it?

Lastly, I'm not familiar with BTC or USDT or USDC or ETH WALLET ADDRESS. Could you kindly explain what these are?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Service options: Drive-through
body:
Hello Mrs. Vivian Sarah Micheal,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about the ATM VISA CARD and the funds associated with it. I'm a bit new to this, so I hope you don't mind me asking a few questions.

Firstly, could you please explain why there is a fee involved? And why does it need to be paid through BTC, USDT, USDC, ETH WALLET ADDRESS, Itune card or steam wallet card?

Also, could you provide more details about the ATM VISA CARD? How does it work and how will I be able to access the funds?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Daniel
